forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: Values across areas

comments.text: Wouldn't it be so awesome if we had Values (on body) witch save a number given in a previous area and bring it over to another area

you could have money, a customizable body without editing  it,
a play mode inventory etc.
only when shared between sub worlds please

thread.latestCommentText: only when shared between sub worlds please
